name: Vertigo Islands
description:
Welcome to Vertigo Islands.

A game made in 3 hours for the trijam game jam.

Press R to restart at any time. 

Controller: Left stick to move, Y button to jump. (Keyboard R to restart)

A and D to move, space to jump. R to restart. 

Reach the princess.

(Note: When you reach the princess and go to the next level I meant to reset the bullets, but didn't have time, so you need to watch out for bullets  when the level begins. Apologies if you get killed immediately)

Credits:
